items.name: Component_Quad
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_Quad
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_Quad extends gs.Component_Visual
    ###*
    * Called if this object instance is restored from a data-bundle. It can be used
    * re-assign event-handler, anonymous functions, etc.
    * 
    * @method onDataBundleRestore.
    * @param Object data - The data-bundle
    * @param gs.ObjectCodecContext context - The codec-context.
    ###
    onDataBundleRestore: (data, context) ->
        @setupEventHandlers()
        
    ###*
    * A quad component displays rectangle on the screen using the color
    * of the game object.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Component_Quad
    * @extends gs.Component
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: ->
        super
        
        ###*
        * The native quad-object to display a colored rectangle on screen.
        * @property quad
        * @type gs.Quad
        * @protected
        ###
        @quad = null 
        
    ###*
    * Disposes the quad.
    * @method dispose
    ###
    dispose: -> @quad.dispose()
    
    ###*
    * Adds event-handlers for mouse/touch events
    *
    * @method setupEventHandlers
    ### 
    setupEventHandlers: ->
        @quad.onIndexChange = =>
            @object.rIndex = @quad.index
            
    ###*
    * Sets up the quad.
    * @method setup
    ###
    setup: ->
        @isSetup = yes
        @quad = new gs.Quad(Graphics.viewport)
        @setupEventHandlers()
        @update()
    
    ###*
    * Updates the quad and its properties.
    * @method update
    ###
    update: ->
        super
        
        @setup() if not @isSetup
        @object.rIndex = @quad.index
        @quad.rect.set(@object.dstRect.x, @object.dstRect.y, @object.dstRect.width, @object.dstRect.height)
        @quad.visible = @object.visible
        @quad.ox = -@object.origin.x
        @quad.oy = -@object.origin.y
        @quad.z = (@object.zIndex || 0) + (if !@object.parent then 0 else @object.parent.zIndex || 0)
        @quad.color = @object.color || Colors.TRANSPARENT
        @quad.opacity = @object.opacity ? 255
        @quad.clipRect = @object.clipRect

gs.Component_Quad = Component_Quad
